title: Open living and dining space with covered patio.
posting_body: Nice ground floor 1 Bed, 1 Bath condominium located in the desirable Falling Water complex in Littleton.
Open living and dining space with covered patio which includes a storage closet.
Built in pocket office in main living/dining area.
Nice kitchen includes newer stainless steel appliances and spacious pantry.
Master bedroom features plenty of natural light, ceiling fan and walk in closet.
Laundry closet offers additional storage and includes Washer/Dryer.
Reserved, deeded parking space is just a few steps from the front door.
Falling Water Condominium complex is a quiet, gated community which features a nice pool/hot tub, club house and work out facility.
Great location with easy access to Shopping, Dinning and C470.
